title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Shade Shower Curtain at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: Bring a chic botanical look to your bathroom with the Shade shower curtain by Kenneth Cole Reaction Home. This shower curtain showcases a painterly leaf pattern in soft plum and linen that's both soothing and beautiful. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/kenneth-cole-reaction-home-shades-shower-curtain/3250043?Keyword=home+shade+shower+curtain
Bring a chic botanical look to your bathroom with the Shade shower curtain by Kenneth Cole Reaction Home. This shower curtain showcases a painterly leaf pattern in soft plum and linen that's both soothing and beautiful. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: The Shade shower curtain by Kenneth Cole reaction home was designed exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond. Made from 60 percent cotton 40 percent polyester the 72 by 72 inch shower curtain features a printed botanical pattern in shades of plum and linen. Also available are coordinating bath mats and towels. The shade shower curtain is part of the Kenneth Cole reaction home collection. It is available exclusively online and in select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
